com.codepoetics.fluvius.test.mocks

Class MockTraceEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codepoetics.fluvius.test.mocks.MockTraceEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TraceEventListener

    public final class MockTraceEventListener
extends Object
implements TraceEventListener
    A mock TraceEventListener with some helpful methods to verify events.
